sentences.en: And sing along in the age of paranoia.
At this point, some conservative factions have become so fearful as to reach levels of paranoia.
sentences.cn: 此时, 一些保守派已变得害怕到某种程度的妄想狂.

sentences.en: Bones : I hate it when you make [ w ] paranoia [ w ] plausible.
sentences.cn: 你这人偏执起来 信口开河 的时候还真讨厌.

sentences.en: But others believe these concerns are unjustified paranoia.
sentences.cn: 但也有一些人认为这是在杞人忧天.

sentences.en: Her passion for cleanliness borders on paranoia.
I took a list of the traits of paranoia from a psychiatrist recently.
sentences.cn: 最近,我从一位精神病医生那里拿来一张妄想狂症状的单子.
对竞争者要保持一种健康的偏执狂心态.

sentences.en: One of the side effects is hallucinations, paranoia.
sentences.cn: 毒副作用的一点就是产生幻觉, 成为妄想狂.

sentences.en: Paranoia reigns supreme among the women, causing much marital conflict.
sentences.cn: 偏执狂现象在妇女中很盛行, 引起了许多婚姻纠纷.

sentences.en: Personal fear varies extremely in degree from mild caution to extreme phobia and paranoia.
sentences.cn: 个人恐惧有很大程度上的差别:从轻微谨慎到极度恐怖及偏执狂.

sentences.en: Sometimes, the result of extreme paranoia is a phobia.
sentences.cn: 有时, 这种极度偏执狂的结果便是恐怖症.

sentences.en: The mood is one of paranoia and expectation of war.
sentences.cn: 那是一种对战争既畏惧又期待的心理。

sentences.en: The temperature seemed to be elevated as the blood rushed to my head the paranoia hit.
sentences.cn: 温度似乎升高了,血液冲进了我的脑袋让我迷糊了.

sentences.en: They capitalize on panic and paranoia.
sentences.cn: 他们利用恐慌和偏执狂。

sentences.en: To establish a sound investment ideas, not paranoia boom.
sentences.cn: 要树立稳健投资的思想, 不要妄想一夜暴富.

sentences.en: Why don't you stick your paranoia back in your pants and get out of here?
sentences.cn: 你何不收敛你的偏执狂然后离开这里?

trans.tran_cn: <医>妄想狂，偏执狂，（对别人的）瞎猜疑，疑神疑鬼
trans.tran_en: a mental illness that makes someone believe that they are very important and that people hate them and are trying to harm them
